definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: Objective To observe the normal morphology of axons in brainstem .
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察腦幹組織中神經軸突的正常形態。

sentences.english: Objective To talk about the regularity and characteristic of blind reflex of patients of with brain steam trauma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦幹損傷患者瞬目反射的規律及特點。

sentences.english: Music lessons and practice during childhood increase the sensitivity of the brain stem to the sounds of human speech.
sentences.chinese: 兒童時期的音樂課和練習會增加腦幹對人聲的敏感性。

sentences.english: Which of the following statements concerning the brainstem reticular formation is NOT true?
sentences.chinese: 下列關於腦幹網狀構造的敘述何者不正確？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the molecular basis with the progress of brainstem injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲探索腦幹損傷後影響傷情進展的分子基礎。

sentences.english: Habenula has been regarded as the major link between forebrain structures and midbrain raphe nuclei.
sentences.chinese: 繮核是聯繫邊緣前腦和低位腦幹的樞紐。

sentences.english: Coma caused by the brain stem injury is a common disease.
sentences.chinese: 腦幹損傷性昏迷，臨牀上比較常見。

sentences.english: This is the section of the brain stem of Einstein.
sentences.chinese: 這是愛因斯坦腦幹的切片。

sentences.english: Brain stem injury is often unilaterai.
sentences.chinese: 腦幹損害常爲非對稱性。

sentences.english: The brainstem enters and exits the skull through this hole; in great apes, it is positioned more towards the back of the skull.
sentences.chinese: 腦幹通過枕骨大孔進出頭骨。

sentences.english: Nucleus habenula is the axis of the descending pathway from limbic system to the brain stem.
sentences.chinese: 繮核是前腦邊緣系統向腦幹下行投射的樞紐。

sentences.english: Put BBE in your products to make them sound better.
sentences.chinese: 在您的產品放入腦幹腦炎，使他們更好的聲音。

sentences.english: But Derek, called DJ, suffered a severe brainstem injury.
sentences.chinese: 但是德里克，腦幹嚴重受傷。

sentences.english: They are in the pons part of the brain stem .
sentences.chinese: 這些神經細胞位於腦幹的腦橋部位。

sentences.english: Results The root entry zoon (REZ) of the trigeminal nerves were found compressed by vasculars in 89 cases.
sentences.chinese: 結果三叉神經入腦幹區有血管壓迫者89例。

sentences.english: A case is described of diabolic hiccup due to a unilateral lesion of nucleus tractus solitarius in the brainstem.
sentences.chinese: 案件描述的毒辣呃逆由於單方面病變的孤束核在腦幹。

definition: unable to turn around a hopeless situation (idiom)/to fail to save the situation
